4:12 just play Noita bro

Edit: To clarify, a rougelike platformer where you play as a witch. You collect spells and wands. Then you combine the spells on the wands to make insane combos. There are 400 spells, all of them have a purpose and there are literally millions of combinations you can do. The game is very hard for beginners, and it has an insane amount of secrets that are so hidden, that the average player will probably never find them without deep, deep exploration. Did i mention every single pixel on the screen is simulated and the game is physics based?

Passive

Unique – Energized: Moving and basic attacking generates Energize stacks, up to 100.

Unique – Helix: Dealing damage with an ability generates 40 Energize stacks, and triggers the effects of  Enrgized attacks if they are ready (2.5 second cooldown).

Unique – Spiral Out: When fully  Energized, your next basic attack generates a Rune stack and fires a missile at the target for each Rune stack you have, dealing 20 − 45 (based on level) (+ 11% bonus AD) (+ 8% AP) (+ 0.3 per 100 bonus health) magic damage with each missile. Stacks are reset every round and between each phase in a round.
